SQL Anywhere® UltraLite®J JNI CLDC 1.1

Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.ianywhere.ultralitejni12

Interface Summary
ColumnSchema Specifies the schema of a column.
ConfigFile Establishes the Configuration for a persistent database saved in a file.
ConfigFileAndroid Establishes the Configuration for a persistent database saved in a file on an Android device.
ConfigNonPersistent Establishes the Configuration for a non-persistent database.
ConfigPersistent Establishes the Configuration for a persistent database.
Configuration Establishes the Configuration for a database.
Connection Describes a database connection, which is required to initiate database operations.
DatabaseInfo Associated with a Connection object and provides methods to reveal database information.
DecimalNumber Describes an exact decimal value and provides decimal arithmetic support for Java platforms where java.math.BigDecimal is not available.
Domain Describes Domain type information for a column in a table.
EncryptionControl Provides EncryptionControl functionality for the database.
FileTransfer Provides a mechanism to transfer files between the client and a MobiLink server.
FileTransferProgressData Reports file transfer progress monitoring data.
FileTransferProgressListener The listener interface for receiving file transfer progress events.
IndexSchema Specifies the schema of an index and provides constants useful for querying system tables.
PreparedStatement Provides methods to execute a SQL query to generate a ResultSet, or to execute a prepared SQL statement on an UltraLite database.
ReceiveDeployFile Provides a mechanism to create an UltraLite database from a received data stream.
ResultSet Provides methods to traverse a table by row, and access the column data.
ResultSetMetadata Associated with a ResultSet object and contains a method that provides column information.
SQLCode Enumerates the SQL codes that may be reported by UltraLiteJ.
StreamHTTPParms Represents HTTP stream parameters that define how to communicate with a MobiLink server using HTTP.
StreamHTTPSParms Represents HTTPS stream parameters that define how to communicate with a MobiLink server using secure HTTPS.
SyncObserver Receives synchronization progress information.
SyncObserver.States Defines the synchronization states that can be signaled to an observer.
SyncResult.AuthStatusCode Enumerates the authorization codes returned by the MobiLink server.
TableSchema Specifies the schema of a table and provides constants defining the names of system tables.
UUIDValue Describes a unique identifier (UUID or Universally Unique IDentifier) object.
 

Class Summary
DatabaseManager Provides static methods to obtain basic configurations, create a new database, and connect to an existing database.
SyncParms Maintains the parameters used during the database synchronization process.
SyncResult Reports status-related information on a specified database synchronization.
Unsigned64 Class to implement unsigned 64-bit binary value.
 

Exception Summary
ULjException Supercedes the exceptions thrown by the UltraLiteJ database.
